inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic severe AVS referred for valve replacement
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Moderate or severe LV systolic dysfunction (LVEF<40%)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients already treated with ACE-I or ARB
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling to participate in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis and is referred for valve replacement.
